layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584 [bgcolor=#FFFFFF]
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 784x60 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 782x58
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 782x54
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 778x54 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutTable (floating) {TABLE} at (2,2) size 774x50 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
                LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 772x48
                  LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 772x44
                    LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 768x44 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
                      LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 724x39
                        text run at (2,2) width 724: "WINGs is a small widget set with the N*XTSTEP look and feel. It's API is inspired in OpenStep and it's implementation"
                        text run at (2,22) width 179: "borrows some ideas from Tk."
